recipes.name: Chef Maria's Enchiladas Verdes
recipes.method: To make Enchiladas Verdes, mix shredded chicken, sour cream, and Monterey Jack cheese, then wrap in tortillas and cover with tomatillo salsa and more cheese. Bake for 20-25 minutes at 350°F.

recipes.name: Chef Juan's Carne Asada Tacos
recipes.method: For Carne Asada Tacos, marinate flank steak in lime juice, soy sauce, and spices, then grill and let rest before slicing. Serve with warmed tortillas, onion, and cilantro.

recipes.name: Chef Luis's Chiles Rellenos
recipes.method: To make Stuffed Poblano Peppers, roast and peel poblano peppers, then stuff with a mixture of ground beef, cooked rice, cheese, garlic, onion, salt, and pepper. Pour tomato sauce over peppers and bake at 350°F for 30-35 minutes.
